verses.text: In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall this \w song|strong="H7892"\w* be \w sung|strong="H7891"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*; We have a \w strong|strong="H5797"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*; \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* will \add God\add* \w appoint|strong="H7896"\w* \add for\add* \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* and \w bulwarks|strong="H2426"\w*.

\w Open|strong="H6605"\w* ye the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, that the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* which \w keepeth|strong="H8104"\w* the \w truth|strong="H0529"\w* may enter \w in|strong="H0935"\w*.\f + \fr 26.2 \ft truth: Heb. truths\f*

Thou wilt \w keep|strong="H5341"\w* \add him\add* in \w perfect|strong="H7965"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \add whose\add* \w mind|strong="H3336"\w* \add is\add* \w stayed|strong="H5564"\w* \add on thee:\add* because he \w trusteth|strong="H0982"\w* in thee.\f + \fr 26.3 \ft perfect…: Heb. peace, peace\f*\f + \fr 26.3 \ft mind: or, thought, or, imagination\f*

\w Trust|strong="H0982"\w* ye in the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* for \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*: for in the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*
d* 
d \+w JEHOVAH|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w strength|strong="H6697"\w*:  +  r 26.4  t everlasting…: Heb. the rock of ages *

¶ For he bringeth \w down|strong="H7817"\w* them that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* on \w high|strong="H4791"\w*; the \w lofty|strong="H7682"\w* \w city|strong="H7151"\w*, he layeth it \w low|strong="H8213"\w*; he layeth it \w low|strong="H8213"\w*, \add even\add* to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*; he \w bringeth|strong="H5060"\w* it \add even\add* to the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*.

The \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* shall tread it \w down|strong="H7429"\w*, \add even\add* the \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* of the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*, \add and\add* the \w steps|strong="H6471"\w* of the \w needy|strong="H1800"\w*.

The \w way|strong="H0734"\w* of the \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \add is\add* \w uprightness|strong="H4339"\w*: thou, most \w upright|strong="H3477"\w*, dost \w weigh|strong="H6424"\w* the \w path|strong="H4570"\w* of the \w just|strong="H6662"\w*.

Yea, in the \w way|strong="H0734"\w* of thy \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, have we \w waited|strong="H6960"\w* for thee; the \w desire|strong="H8378"\w* of \add our\add* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \add is\add* to thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, and to the \w remembrance|strong="H2143"\w* of thee.

With my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* have I \w desired|strong="H0183"\w* thee in the \w night|strong="H3915"\w*; yea, with my \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w within|strong="H7130"\w* me will I seek thee \w early|strong="H7836"\w*: for when thy \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* \add are\add* in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w world|strong="H8398"\w* will \w learn|strong="H3925"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*.

Let favour be \w shewed|strong="H2603"\w* to the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, \add yet\add* will he \w not|strong="H1077"\w* \w learn|strong="H3925"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*: in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w uprightness|strong="H5229"\w* will he deal \w unjustly|strong="H5765"\w*, and will \w not|strong="H1077"\w* \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* the \w majesty|strong="H1348"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

\nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add when\add* thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* is lifted \w up|strong="H7311"\w*, they will not \w see|strong="H2372"\w*: \add but\add* they shall \w see|strong="H2372"\w*, and be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* for \add their\add* \w envy|strong="H7068"\w* at the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; yea, the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* of thine \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w* shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* them.\f + \fr 26.11 \ft at…: or, toward thy people\f*

¶ \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, thou wilt \w ordain|strong="H8239"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* for us: for thou also hast \w wrought|strong="H6466"\w* all our \w works|strong="H4639"\w* in us.\f + \fr 26.12 \ft in us: or, for us\f*

O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add other\add* \w lords|strong="H0113"\w* \w beside|strong="H2108"\w* thee have had \w dominion|strong="H1166"\w* over us: \add but\add* by thee only will we make \w mention|strong="H2142"\w* of thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

\add They are\add* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, they shall not \w live|strong="H2421"\w*; \add they are\add* \w deceased|strong="H7496"\w*, they shall not \w rise|strong="H6965"\w*: therefore hast thou \w visited|strong="H6485"\w* and \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* them, and made all their \w memory|strong="H2143"\w* to \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*.

Thou hast \w increased|strong="H3254"\w* the \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, thou hast \w increased|strong="H3254"\w* the \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*: thou art \w glorified|strong="H3513"\w*: thou hadst removed \add it\add* \w far|strong="H7368"\w* \add unto\add* all the \w ends|strong="H7099"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, in \w trouble|strong="H6862"\w* have they \w visited|strong="H6485"\w* thee, they poured \w out|strong="H6694"\w* a \w prayer|strong="H3908"\w* \add when\add* thy \w chastening|strong="H4148"\w* \add was\add* upon them.\f + \fr 26.16 \ft prayer: Heb. secret speech\f*

\w Like|strong="H3644"\w* as a woman with \w child|strong="H2030"\w*, \add that\add* draweth \w near|strong="H7126"\w* the time of her \w delivery|strong="H3205"\w*, is in \w pain|strong="H2342"\w*, \add and\add* crieth \w out|strong="H2199"\w* in her \w pangs|strong="H2256"\w*; so have we been in thy \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

We have been with \w child|strong="H2029"\w*, we have been in \w pain|strong="H2342"\w*, we have as it \w were|strong="H3644"\w* brought \w forth|strong="H3205"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*; we have not \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* any \w deliverance|strong="H3444"\w* in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; \w neither|strong="H1077"\w* have the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w world|strong="H8398"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w*.

Thy \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \add men\add* shall \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, \add together with\add* my dead \w body|strong="H5038"\w* shall they \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*. \w Awake|strong="H6974"\w* and \w sing|strong="H7442"\w*, ye that \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* in \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*: for thy \w dew|strong="H2919"\w* \add is as\add* the \w dew|strong="H2919"\w* of \w herbs|strong="H0219"\w*, and the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* shall cast \w out|strong="H5307"\w* the \w dead|strong="H7496"\w*.

¶ \w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* thou into thy \w chambers|strong="H2315"\w*, and \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* thy \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* about thee: \w hide|strong="H2247"\w* thyself as it were for a \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w moment|strong="H7281"\w*, until the \w indignation|strong="H2195"\w* be \w overpast|strong="H5674"\w*.

For, behold, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* cometh \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of his \w place|strong="H4725"\w* to \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* for their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*: the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* also shall \w disclose|strong="H1540"\w* her \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and shall no more \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* her \w slain|strong="H2026"\w*.\f + \fr 26.21 \ft blood: Heb. bloods\f*
